pages.text: The leprechauns infused the arconium essence with a block of gold using a pedestal ritual. The resulting arconium gold block appeared to have a special ability. If placed under a leprechaun hat that is linked to a pot of gold, the pot will slowly absorb the gold, leaving behind a block of pure arconium.

The absorbed gold seemed to fill the pot far more efficiently than throwing in gold ingots, and is thus a cheaper way to get other resources from the pot. After a while, the gold appeared to be absorbed and the leprechauns mined the purified arconium block to convert it into to ingots.
